policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK Exchange Token Lifetime Configuration"/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Overwrite exchange token life time==="/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Set  at_lifetime context vaiable  ==="/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Subject of type 'access token' expiry - ${session.expires_at}   ==="/>
                    </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    </wsp:All>
                </wsp:Policy>
